title: EBRD Board of Directors
snippet: While retaining overall authority over the Bank, the Board of Governors delegates most powers to the Board of Directors, which is responsible for approving the EBRD's country, sector and thematic strategies, policies and operations.

title: Board of Governors Information
snippet: Our background and history · Our organisation · Our values · Strategies, governance and compliance · Project accountability · Back · Story of the EBRD · Basic documents establishing the Bank · Back · Governance and leadership · Shareholders · Staff · Headquarters ·

title: EBRD governance and leadership
snippet: Each shareholder is represented on the Board of Governors which has overall authority over the Bank and approves its strategic direction. ... The Board of Directors is responsible for our country, sector and thematic strategies, policies and operations. The Executive Committee oversees all key aspects of the strategy, performance and financial soundness of the Bank. Our senior leadership group covers every aspect of the EBRD's business and advises the Executive Committee and President.

title: EBRD: staff, structure, history
snippet: Each shareholder is represented on the Board of Governors, which has overall authority over the Bank. Our President is Odile Renaud-Basso (pictured right). The President manages our work under the guidance of the Board of Directors. The Executive Committee and senior leadership group advise the President and oversee EBRD activities.
